newsitem.title: THAILAND: BOXING-THAILAND'S SAEN RETAINS WBA FLYWEIGHT TITLE.
newsitem.headline: BOXING-THAILAND'S SAEN RETAINS WBA FLYWEIGHT TITLE.

text.p: Thailand's Saen Sor Ploenchit retained the World Boxing Association (WBA) flyweight title by beating Alexander Mahmutov of Russia on a unanimous points decision in Nakhon Phanom on Sunday.
